A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw it opening night\, I've been watching the first run of all the Star Wars movies in theaters since the original Star Wars (now Ep IV \"A New Hope) first hit the big screen\, so that makes me a fan.\n\nI enjoyed this one.  It started out a lot like Empire\, but quickly moved away from that line (I'm glad).  There was a lot of subtlety in this one.  I left with a few questions\, but nothing to make me not like the film.  It did almost feel like the saga could end after this one rather than demand an ep. IX to wrap everything up.  I'd expand on those thoughts but it would require spoiling some things\, so I won't
